title: Linux User at Best Buy
alt: We actually stand around the antivirus displays with the Mac users just waiting for someone to ask.
transcript:
Salesman: Interested in updating your antivirus software?
Cueball: Oh, I wouldn't need any of that.[In a spiky speech bubble.]
Cueball: I run Linux.[Cueball does a backflip onto a motorcycle.]
Flip[Cueball performs a wheelie on the motorcycle.][Cueball does a hard, donut turn on the motorcycle, kicking up dirt into the salesman's face.][Cueball speeds off on the motorcycle, leaving the salesman in a cloud of black exhaust.]
